appActuallyUsesPermissions.appActuallyUsesPermission: permission that the app actually used in its code

appRequiredPermissions.appRequiredPermission: required permission to access this app

appDefinedPermissions.appDefinedPermission: custom permission defined by this app

component.dsmIdx: the index of the component in the DSM
component.appPackageName: the poackage name of its hosting application
component.type: type of the component. VALUES: activity, service, receiver, or provider
component.requiredPrmToAccess: The required permission to access this component, i.e., other components must have this permission to be able to communicate with this component.
component.providerReadPermission: if the component is a ContentProvider, then this is the required pemrission to read data from this ContentProvider.
component.providerWritePermission: if the component is a ContentProvider, then this is the required pemrission to modify the data contained in this ContentProvider.
component.providerAuthority: if this component is a ContentProvider, then this is the URI for this content provider

compRequiredPermissions.compRequiredPermission: a required permission to communicate with this component

compActuallyUsedPermissions.compActuallyUsedPermissionsn: a permission that is actually used by this component

intentFilter.ifID: unique identifier for this Intent filter

actions.action: an action this Intent filter can handle

categories.category: a category this Intent filter can handle

data_item.scheme: The scheme part of the URI
data_item.host: The host part of the URI

intentFilter.dataPath: data path that should match in the Intent, if specified
